constraints.style: clean, premium, minimal copy, bold typography

options.rationale: Educational approach focusing on accessibility and learning, perfect for beginners
options.audience_fit_notes: Addresses 'where to start' pain point with clear, friendly messaging

design_spec.layout: Centered composition with crypto iconography, bold headline at top, CTA button at bottom
design_spec.typography_intent: Bold, modern sans-serif (Montserrat/Inter), large headline (48-60pt), clear hierarchy
design_spec.imagery_direction: Clean, premium visuals with crypto symbols, modern gradient backgrounds, high contrast
design_spec.brand_color_usage_notes: Primary eToro blue (#1E88E5) for CTA, green accents for positive messaging
design_spec.animation_vibe: Smooth fade-in of elements, subtle motion on crypto icons

en.image_prompt: Professional marketing image: Modern cryptocurrency trading interface, clean premium aesthetic, eToro blue (#1E88E5) and green (#4CAF50) color scheme, bold typography, centered composition, high contrast, minimal copy overlay, 1:1 aspect ratio, marketing quality
en.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, text errors, financial promises, guarantees, misleading imagery, cluttered, unprofessional

de.image_prompt: Professionelles Marketing-Bild: Moderne Kryptowährungs-Handelsplattform, sauberes Premium-Design, eToro Blau (#1E88E5) und Grün (#4CAF50) Farbschema, fette Typografie, zentrierte Komposition, hoher Kontrast, minimaler Text-Overlay, 1:1 Seitenverhältnis, Marketing-Qualität
de.negative_prompt: unscharf, niedrige Qualität, Textfehler, Finanzversprechen, Garantien, irreführende Bilder, überladen, unprofessionell

required_disclaimers: Crypto assets are highly volatile. Your capital is at risk.

global_disclaimers.de: Kryptowährungen sind sehr volatil. Ihr Kapital ist gefährdet.
